ProductInfo.Features:
Image sensor: Sony CCD, color DSP. Signal system: NTSC standard
Horizontal resolution: 480 TVL. Lens: built-in f3.6mm Lens for wide angle view
Digital automatic backlight compensation
Small size, discreet installation. Weatherproof housing for indoor and outdoor application
Package included: 8 x bullet security cameras, 2 x 12V DC 4 channel power supplies and 8 x bonus security warning signs
